author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

After https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31892, this is the next step to migrate the `RecoEgamma/EgammaElectronProducers` package, but it also affects other packages.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles, local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Use ESGetTokens in Egamma regression tools
